entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
